overview: Every day extracurricular classes and tutoring classes make Xia Shiyuan in the third grade overwhelmed. After a big fight with her mother, Xia Shiyuan runs away from home. Afterwards, she meets a kind homeless man. With the help of the homeless man, she understands her parents Love her, go back home and communicate with her mother, and her mother promises not to force her again.
title: Bear Kid
